headline: Coca-Cola quietly makes a massive change to its soda brands
summary: While Keurig has faced an enormous backlash over the waste produced by its K-Cups, and Starbucks, McDonald's, and many other chains have faced criticism over plastic straws, Coca-Cola has largely gotten a pass on its wasteful packaging. That's not to say that nobody has criticized the beverage ...

headline: McDonald's Stock Looks Cheap - Analysts Are Lovin' MCD and Raising Their PTs
summary: Analysts have been raising their price targets (PTs) for McDonald's stock (MCD) over the last month. Meanwhile, my price target remains 19% higher at $370. Shorting out-of-the-money puts and calls works here.

headline: Will Grinch Meal Buzz and Collectibles Strategy Meaningfully Shift McDonald's (MCD) Brand Relevance Narrative?
summary: In early December 2025, McDonald’s rolled out a limited-edition Grinch Meal and other seasonal tie-ins, such as Disneyland Resort 70th Celebration Happy Meals, which sparked strong customer demand, social media buzz, and even merchandise shortages at some locations. Beyond short-term holiday traffic, these promotions highlight how McDonald’s is leaning on collectibles, nostalgia, and themed menu innovation to deepen engagement with adult customers as well as families. We’ll now consider how...

headline: How New Analyst Views Are Rewriting the Story Behind McDonald's Stock
summary: McDonald's stock narrative has been subtly recalibrated, with the fair value estimate edging slightly lower as analysts balance enthusiasm for long term brand strength against near term traffic and value mix uncertainties. A marginal uptick in the discount rate and a small trim to expected revenue growth reflect this more cautious stance, even as long range compounding potential remains firmly in focus. Read on to see how these quiet shifts in assumptions can reshape the story around the...
